resources.string:
2018.10.13:
 · Fix: Login problems due to website change
 
 2018.09.17:
 · Fix: Crashes on logging page during server instabilities
 · Fix: Greek translation not working
 · New: Notify the user if coordinate checker of geocaching.com is available via website
 
 2018.08.14:
 · Fix: Login page changed on geocaching.com causing login problems
 
 2018.08.13:
 · Fix: Personal note not downloaded from server
 · Fix: Only 20 trackables where shown when logging a cache
 · Fix: Show closeout warning on Android below 4.1
 Android 4.0 can no longer login to geocaching.com
 · Fix: Direction line was always shown on OSM or offline maps
 
 2018.06.26:
 · New: New mapsforge library (former beta version) now used by default for OSM and offline maps
 Known regressions we are still working on (click for info):
 Circles around caches not yet implemented
 Waypoints of caches might be already hidden below limit
 More caches might be shown with orange circles
 · New: Days since cache has been saved now replaced by months or years when applicable
 · New: Contact owner by clicking on user name now also for OC caches
 · New: Translation to Cebuano and Greek
 · New: Support OC GPX extensions
 · New: Log template [SIZE]
 · New: Also extract waypoints from short description
 · Fix: Turkish translation not working
 · Fix: Rest user modified coords did not restore cache coords locally
 · Fix: Avoid crash after deleting a GPX file on the import screen
 · Fix: GPS was switched off when editing a waypoint
 · Change: Use new gc.com logging page for submitting logs
